cohortName: [PL 4058821001] Primary sclerosing cholangitis referent concept incident cohort: First occurrence of referent concept + descendants with >=365d prior observation
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (4058821) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: [PL 4058821002] Primary sclerosing cholangitis referent concept prevalent cohort: First occurrence of referent concept + descendants
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (4058821) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history, with at least 365 days of prior continuous observation. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: [PL 4058821003] Primary sclerosing cholangitis incidence cohort with atleast one more diagnosis in the 12 months after initial diagnosis
logicDescription: Primary sclerosing cholangitis at first diagnosis with 365 days continuous observation. Cohort exit is the end of continuous observable time for the person.

cohortName: [PL 4058821004] Primary sclerosing cholangitis incidence cohort with atleast one more diagnosis in the 24 months after initial diagnosis
logicDescription: Primary sclerosing cholangitis at first diagnosis with 365 days continuous observation. Cohort exit is the end of continuous observable time for the person.

cohortName: [PL 4058821005] Primary sclerosing cholangitis excluding sclerosing cholangitis and secondary cholangitis
logicDescription: Primary sclerosing cholangitis excluding sclerosing cholangitis and secondary cholangitis
